statements: SELECT * FROM legal_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type='Contract'
SELECT document_content FROM legal_documents WHERE document_id=3
SELECT document_name, document_type, document_date FROM legal_documents ORDER BY document_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_documents FROM legal_documents
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_type, document_date FROM legal_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Agreement';
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM legal_documents WHERE document_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_date FROM legal_documents WHERE document_content LIKE '%confidential%';
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT title, signer, date_signed FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM contracts WHERE signer = 'John Doe';
SELECT contract_id, title, signer FROM contracts WHERE date_signed >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM statutes WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA' ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE signer = 'Alice' ORDER BY date_signed DESC
SELECT title, content FROM contracts WHERE date_signed >= '2022-01-01' AND date_signed <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY contract_id ASC
SELECT contract_id, signer FROM contracts WHERE title LIKE '%services%'
SELECT * FROM statutes WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA' AND effective_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY statute_id DESC
SELECT title, jurisdiction FROM statutes WHERE content LIKE '%regulation%' ORDER BY jurisdiction, statute_id
SELECT * FROM contracts ORDER BY signing_date DESC;
SELECT contract_name, party1, party2 FROM contracts WHERE signing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agreement_name, party1, party2 FROM agreements WHERE effective_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT statute_name, jurisdiction FROM statutes WHERE enactment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT party1, party2, enactment_date FROM statutes ORDER BY enactment_date ASC;
SELECT contract_name, party1, party2, signing_date FROM contracts ORDER BY signing_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT agreement_name, party1, effective_date FROM agreements WHERE party1='Company A';
SELECT statute_name, jurisdiction FROM statutes WHERE enactment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM contracts JOIN agreements ON contracts.party1 = agreements.party2;
SELECT agreement_name, party1, party2, effective_date FROM agreements WHERE agreement_name LIKE 'Sales %';
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_type = 'Service';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM agreements ORDER BY agreement_date DESC;
SELECT statute_name, statute_category FROM statutes WHERE statute_category = 'Labor Law';
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_type = 'Service';
SELECT contract_name, contract_date, contract_body FROM contracts WHERE contract_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT agreement_type, agreement_date FROM agreements WHERE agreement_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY agreement_date ASC;
SELECT statute_name, statute_category, statute_body FROM statutes WHERE statute_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM contracts;
SELECT agreement_name, agreement_date FROM agreements;
SELECT statute_name, statute_text FROM statutes;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_contact FROM clients;
SELECT user_email, user_name, user_role FROM users;
SELECT * FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_date DESC, contract_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_name, contract_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, contract_text FROM contracts WHERE contract_text LIKE '%confidential%';
SELECT c.contract_name, u.user_name FROM contracts c INNER JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM agreements WHERE agreement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
